title: Team Health Assessment
description: Evaluate your team's overall health and alignment with MOHI values across trust, communication, adaptability, workload, and core values.

questions.question: Team members trust one another to follow through on commitments.
Our team communicates openly and clearly.
Conflicts in the team are resolved constructively.
We have clarity on team roles and responsibilities.
The team has a shared sense of purpose.
Our team adapts well to unexpected changes or challenges.
Team morale is consistently positive.
Workload is balanced fairly among team members.
We celebrate wins and progress together.
Team members feel safe sharing ideas and concerns.
We hold one another accountable respectfully.
Meetings are productive and focused.
Our team is proactive in solving problems.
We collaborate effectively across different functions or departments.
Team members are resilient when facing challenges.
Servanthood is evident in how team members support one another.
We uphold integrity in our actions and decisions.
Our work contributes to transformation in people and communities.
We practice bold dependence on God in decision-making.
We show humility in how we relate to each other.
Trust among team members is strong and consistent.
We listen actively to one another.
The team has clear goals and priorities.
There is a strong sense of accountability in our team.
Team members manage stress and workload effectively.

Trust.characteristics: High trust fosters collaboration and psychological safety.
Trust.advice: Build trust through transparency, consistency, and follow-through.

Communication.characteristics: Effective communication enables clarity and cohesion.
Communication.advice: Encourage open dialogue and active listening.

Conflict Management.advice: Address conflicts quickly with respect and focus on solutions.

Clarity & Purpose.characteristics: Clear goals and roles enhance focus and productivity.
Clarity & Purpose.advice: Revisit vision and roles regularly to ensure alignment.

Adaptability.characteristics: Adaptable teams remain resilient under change.
Adaptability.advice: Foster flexibility, continuous learning, and openness to feedback.

Morale & Well-being.characteristics: Positive morale supports motivation and retention.
Morale & Well-being.advice: Celebrate wins, show appreciation, and balance workload.

Workload Balance.characteristics: Fair distribution prevents burnout and resentment.
Workload Balance.advice: Monitor workload regularly and adjust responsibilities fairly.

Servanthood.characteristics: Teams thrive when members serve one another selflessly.
Servanthood.advice: Encourage acts of service and support beyond personal tasks.

Integrity.advice: Commit to honesty, fairness, and ethical decision-making.

Transformation.characteristics: Transformative teams impact individuals and communities.
Transformation.advice: Focus on long-term change, not just short-term tasks.

Bold Dependence on God.characteristics: Faith-centered teams draw strength from God in challenges.
Bold Dependence on God.advice: Integrate prayer, devotion, and reliance on God into team practices.
